Html:
Hi, I installed Wabbitemu on my Nexus 5 and downloaded a TI85 ROM off the Internet. When I start Wabbitemu and choose the "I already have a ROM file" it can't find the ROM (i saved it in the downloads directory on my phone).

If I choose "Help me create a ROM..." then TI85 isn't one of the options.

Please advise. I actually have a TI85 and am fine with creating a ROM file on the phone rather than downloading one, but right now I can't do anything.

Thank you!
...ok not to worry, Andie Graph works fine - I'll use that instead.
